ygData.subject: Cazic Advice
ygData.msgSnippet: All, I just became a newly minted Bard of 20 songs, and have read (a Cleric guide, I believe) that I could start adventuring in Cazic.  The guide listed as one
ygData.messageBody:
All,

I just became a newly minted Bard of 20 songs, and have read (a Cleric
guide, I believe) that I could start adventuring in Cazic. The guide listed
as one of the plusses that it really gives you an opportunity to hone your
group skills, which I am looking to do. I have never adventured there
before with any of my other characters and I was wondering the following:

1. Do I have a reasonable chance of survival in Cazic if I play smart at
level 20?

2. Are Bards in demand in Cazic? I imagine that there are a lot of rogues
around, but are groups normally balanced?

3. What is the typical crowding of Cazic nowadays? I know it was bad in
the Rubicite days, has it gotten any better?

4. If you think I am crazy to go to Cazic, where do you recommend that
isn't Aviaks, Oasis, or some other Hellicamped area?

Thank you very much.

Dilvish
Bard of 20 songs
Povar Server
